lead_paragraph: Portugal coach Fernando Santos is counting on Cristiano Ronaldo to use another impressive season with Real Madrid as a springboard to a strong Euro 2016 campaign.

headline.print_headline: Cristiano Ronaldo Even More Vital to Portugal Than to Real-Santos
headline.main: Cristiano Ronaldo Even More Vital to Portugal Than to Real-Santos
